meteoroids.Meteoroids.controllers.utilities

Class TextHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • meteoroids.Meteoroids.controllers.utilities.TextHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable

    public class TextHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements Drawable
    Handles drawing texts to the screen. Call initFont() method before using this class to load the desired TrueType font.
    Author:
    vpyyhtia
